alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 17 at 5:59PM MST until August 17 at 9:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until 800 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 556 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to several thunderstorms moving over the same area. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen along and near Highway 286 between Three Points and Sasabe. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sasabe. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
